text: @DavMicRot @realDonaldTrump is incompetent/evil, but it's the profiteering healthcare system devised by @JoeBiden and @BarackObama that can't get deliver cotton swabs to test for #COVID19. Has @SpeakerPelosi introduced #MedicareForAll? No, she never will. This calamity is deeper than Trump.
